import:
<%
%><% for (let eventListener of Instruction.EventListeners) { %><%
    %><%
        let environments = [];

        if (eventListener.Environment === 3)
        {
            environments = [ "user", "admin" ];
        }
        else if (eventListener.Environment === 2)
        {
            environments = [ "admin" ];
        }
        else
        {
            environments = [ "user" ];
        }%><%
    %><% for (let environment of environments) { %>
        <eventlistener<%
        %> name="<%= eventListener.Name %><%
        %><% if (environments.length > 1) { %><%
            %><%= (environment === "user" ? "FrontEnd" : "BackEnd" ) %><%
        %><% } %>">
            <%= eventListener.ClassName %>
            <%= (eventListener.Inherit ? 1 : 0) %>
            <%= eventListener.EventName %>
            <%= eventListener.EventHandlerClassName %>
            <%= environment %>
        <%
    %><% } %><%
%><% } %>
delete: <% %><% for (let name of Instruction.Names) { %> <eventlistener name="<%= name %>" /><% %><% } %>
